system.description:
When you can conjure hammers at will, every problem starts looking like an eldritch nail.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Witch, you must have solved at least three problems using Magic when they could have been solved otherwise.

The Witch starts with a Witch Custom Move of their choice.

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.DMJcue0vvhsAoR3W]{CONJURER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.xrgvmY1KAYqdF2xo]{DEFYING GRAVITY}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.OWvFUpuAHsXKrYfN]{POTION'S MASTER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.ScHcQfAU1JOelX44]{STITCHED TOGETHER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.xqBBk56SorItqruc]{TURN YOU INTO A NEWT}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.witch.Item.cHLX3g9zrODz5wxd]{WITCH'S FAMILIAR}

advancements.name: Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
